title: Admiral Overalls
content:
Firstly, I have nothing to do with this game other than that I just found it with a semi-random Google action.

I found a heavily Keen-inspired game called [url=http://www.gamedev.net/community/gds/viewentry.asp?projectid=403460]Admiral Overalls[/url].
It's about Billy Overalls, a 14-year old space pilot who crashes on an alien planet.
He uses his slingshot to launch tomatoes at enemies, a bit like Flower Power-style.

The forum post I found it through is [url=http://www.gamedev.net/community/forums/topic.asp?topic_id=403465]here[/url],.
Just try both links for some screenshots, a better description that what I could write.
There is soundcard support.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Admiral Overalls
content:
Well, it really seems this game has been inspired by Keen. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I don't care to try it, however, somebody tell if it's any good.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Admiral what?!
content: Haha--his standing position looks extremely familiar! Great find, Ret. How would you compare the gameplay between the two?

title: Re: Admiral Overalls
content:
Requires that stupid .NET framework. When will people learn? I'll see if I can get it running sometime.

Neat find.

title: Re: Admiral Overalls
content:
It even has a worldmap!
It's an allright game, the tomatoes throwing was a nice found but I'm not to fond on the way you jump and the lack of movements the character can make.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Re: Admiral Overalls
content: I agree. It's cute, and it plays okay, but the jumping system is horrible, and merely because you have to hold up while jumping. Argh. The game sort of reminds me of Monster Bash.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]
